players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is the mafioso and we should vote him out."
Diana: "I stand by my investigation. Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out to win."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out to secure our win."

You: "Diana, you're lying! If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so openly on Day 1? That makes you an easy target! Charlie, think about this - a real detective would be more subtle. Diana is the actual mafioso trying..."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is the mafioso and we should vote him out."
You: "I stand by my investigation. Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out to win."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out to secure our win."

Bob: "Diana, you're lying! If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so openly on Day 1? That makes you an easy target! Charlie, think about this - a real detective would be more subtle. Diana is the actual mafioso trying..."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
